String.string: The Valley of the Guwangi
"Got it."
"This sounds like Madat."
Follow the trail west and look for clues about Madat's kidnapping.
Search guwangi patrols for clues about Madat's whereabouts.
"This looks promising."
Search for Madat in Mjusu Kraal.
"Got it."
Talk to the frail man.
Kill guwangis and search Mjusu Kraal.
That looks like Madat. Move closer.
Find Madat deep in Mjusu Kraal.
"After you."
Speak with Madat.
Speak to Rhodos on the hill overlooking Mjusu Kraal.
Found Mendara Cavern
This must be the cave Rhodos mentioned.
Climb the hill and find Found Mendara Cavern.
Guwangis and Arachnens
Fight your way through Mendara Cavern
"Thank you."
Speak with Rhodos at the Khirian Sanctuary.
